#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main () {
	string s; cin >> s;
	int tc; cin >> tc;
	while (tc--) {
		long long int a, b;
		cin >> a >> b;
		//c o m p u t e r | c o m p u t e r |
		long long x =  0, y = 0;
		x = a%s.size(); y = b%s.size();
		x--; y--;
		if (s[x]==s[y])
			cout << "Yes\n";
		else
			cout << "No\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
